tables.table_schema: CREATE TABLE encryption_keys ( key_id SERIAL PRIMARY KEY, key_value VARCHAR(255) NOT NULL );
CREATE TABLE security_protocols ( protocol_id SERIAL PRIMARY KEY, protocol_name VARCHAR(50) NOT NULL, is_secure BOOLEAN NOT NULL DEFAULT TRUE );

CREATE TABLE encryption_keys (
  key_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
  encryption_key BYTEA
)

CREATE TABLE security_protocols (
  protocol_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
  protocol_name VARCHAR(50),
  protocol_version VARCHAR(10)
)

CREATE TABLE communication_logs (
  log_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
  timestamp TIMESTAMP,
  message TEXT,
  success BOOLEAN
)

CREATE TABLE encryption_keys (
 id INT PRIMARY KEY,
 key_name VARCHAR(50),
 key_value VARCHAR(100),
 key_type VARCHAR(20)
)

CREATE TABLE communication_protocols (
 id INT PRIMARY KEY,
 protocol_name VARCHAR(50),
 protocol_version VARCHAR(10),
 encryption_algorithm VARCHAR(30)
)

CREATE TABLE secure_logs (
 id INT PRIMARY KEY,
 log_timestamp TIMESTAMP,
 log_message TEXT
)

CREATE TABLE access_controls (
 id INT PRIMARY KEY,
 user_id INT,
 access_level VARCHAR(10),
 access_timestamp TIMESTAMP
)

CREATE TABLE audit_trail (
 id INT PRIMARY KEY,
 action VARCHAR(50),
 action_timestamp TIMESTAMP,
 user_id INT
)
